name: npg-port-remodeler
description: takes a portgraph (e.g. from math2graph) and remodels the port information by creating a node for each port and connecting them accordingly.

scripts.test: node node_modules/standard/bin/cmd.js src/**/*.js && gulp && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel/register

author: Georg Schuppe
